topic: Beer recommendations and brewing. Cider included.
text: <@U0EL0GLEL|peter.bliss> set the channel topic: Beer recommendations and brewing. Cider included.
My sour cherry red was tasted this weekend. Its fantastic!! A bottle will make its way here shortly
Yay! Can’t wait to try it
Dry hopping my cider tonight that I pressed a few days ago

aged in a keg for a year+ then on tart cherries and oak for a few months, then into the bottle and conditioned there for another few months. It carbonated! and I tried 2 bottles this weekend. Its nice and tart, will bring some in, but have to be careful to not shake them.

Also have blackberry wine and a super dark rum going! :slightly_smiling_face: As well just bottled last years raspberry wine. Will bring some of that in. And last years banana wine is going into bottles. Oh and I tried a cider I made last year finally and its amazingly balanced. not super sweet or dry
Will need to bring that one too
Wow. Bring it all Peter!
for sure!
i love this channel!
it’s crazy, looking at all other slack memebers, i don’t know if any others are in fact beer/cider enthusiasts
figured we needed a channel for recommendations, and whats brewing. As well we can coordinate what we are bringing in for share.
spotted this craziness today <https://www.engadget.com/2016/07/26/alchema-connected-cider-homebrewer/>

attachments.title: Alchema can make homebrew cider your next DIY habit
attachments.text: Alchema is a connected device that turns fresh fruit into hard cider in a few days.
attachments.fallback: Engadget: Alchema can make homebrew cider your next DIY habit

i was telling peter but i’m planning to birng in a stone enjoy after 7/4/16.  <https://www.beeradvocate.com/beer/profile/147/139129/>  will happily share with this group

attachments.title: Stone Enjoy After Brett IPA | Stone Brewing
attachments.text: Stone Enjoy After Brett IPA is a American IPA style beer brewed by Stone Brewing in Escondido, CA. 87 out of 100 with 73 reviews, ratings and opinions.
